<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This pass tracks for each instruction what is the &quot;closest&quot; reaching def of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a given register. It is used by BreakFalseDeps (for clearance calculation)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and ExecutionDomainFix (for arbitrating conflicting domains).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that this is different from the usual definition notion of liveness.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The CPU doesn&#39;t care whether or not we consider a register killed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
